{
  "name": "Bishwanath Jana",
  "email": "bishwanathjana2002@gmail.com",
  "phone": "9679113763",
  "linkedin_url": "LinkedIn",
  "github_url": "GitHub",
  "experience": [
    {
      "job_title": "Software Engineer",
      "company": "Nature Technology",
      "start_date": "Dec 2023",
      "end_date": "Present",
      "description": "Independently developed and fine-tuned GPT-3.5-turbo-1106 models for enhanced conversational AI for CarChat24 – AI-Driven Automotive Chatbot. Managed and formatted proprietary chat data into JSONL format, improving AI model training and response accuracy. Integrated AI-driven backend features using C#, .NET, SQL, and Docker, including automated billing and invoicing. Developed backend systems with C#, PostgreSQL, and Docker for WEBEL – Government Project, implementing features like multi-payment processing, onboarding, and offboarding. Conducted regular client meetings, resolved complex system bugs, and ensured a seamless user experience. Designed and implemented an AI-based speech-to-text system for SyncExpress – AI Video Transcription (US Law Firm), reducing 2-3 hour video transcription time to 15-20 minutes without GPU acceleration. Optimized text comparison algorithms for increased transcription accuracy and automated legal documentation workflows."
    },
    {
      "job_title": "Intel Unnati Industrial Training",
      "company": "Intel",

      "start_date": "Jan 2018",
      "end_date": "May 2020",
      "description": "Analyzed large datasets to provide insights and recommendations to stakeholders. Developed and maintained data pipelines using Python and SQL. Created visualizations and dashboards using Tableau. Conducted A/B testing to measure the impact of changes."

  ],

experience.description: Independently developed and fine-tuned GPT-3.5-turbo-1106 models for enhanced conversational AI for CarChat24 – AI-Driven Automotive Chatbot. Managed and formatted proprietary chat data into JSONL format, improving AI model training and response accuracy. Integrated AI-driven backend features using C#, .NET, SQL, and Docker, including automated billing and invoicing. Developed backend systems with C#, PostgreSQL, and Docker for WEBEL – Government Project, implementing features like multi-payment processing, onboarding, and offboarding. Conducted regular client meetings, resolved complex system bugs, and ensured a seamless user experience. Designed and implemented an AI-based speech-to-text system for SyncExpress – AI Video Transcription (US Law Firm), reducing 2-3 hour video transcription time to 15-20 minutes without GPU acceleration. Optimized text comparison algorithms for increased transcription accuracy and automated legal documentation workflows.
Designed an AI-based ATM automation workflow, implementing modern software development practices for enhanced efficiency.

}

tasks_output.description:
Process the job description provided at Here’s a **dummy job posting** in text format that you can use for testing your system:

---

**Software Engineer – AI & Machine Learning**  
**Company:** Tech Innovations Inc.  
**Location:** Remote  
**Job Type:** Full-time  

### **Job Description:**  
We are seeking a passionate **Software Engineer (AI & Machine Learning)** to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will have experience developing and deploying AI models, working with large datasets, and optimizing machine learning algorithms for real-world applications.  

### **Responsibilities:**  
- Design, develop, and deploy **AI-driven solutions** for various business use cases.  
- Build and optimize machine learning models for **NLP, computer vision, and predictive analytics**.  
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data engineers and product managers.  
- Implement APIs and integrate AI models into production systems.  
- Ensure model performance, scalability, and efficiency.  
- Stay up to date with the latest trends and advancements in AI & ML.  

### **Required Skills:**  
- Proficiency in **Python** and frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn.  
- Experience with **LLMs (Large Language Models)** and generative AI.  
- Strong understanding of **data structures, algorithms, and software design principles**.  
- Familiarity with **cloud platforms** (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) for AI deployment.  
- Hands-on experience with **NLP, computer vision, or reinforcement learning**.  
- Experience with **SQL & NoSQL databases** for data storage and retrieval.  
- Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently.  

### **Preferred Qualifications:**  
- Master’s or PhD in Computer Science, AI, or a related field.  
- Experience in deploying AI solutions using **Docker and Kubernetes**.  
- Knowledge of **MLOps** and CI/CD for AI workflows.  
- Contributions to open-source AI projects.  

### **Salary & Benefits:**  
- Competitive salary ($100K - $140K)  
- Fully remote work option  
- Health, dental, and vision insurance  
- 401(k) matching  
- Learning and development budget  

---

This dummy job posting provides **clear structure and various technical skills** that your system can analyze against a candidate’s resume. You can use this as `job_posting` input in your test runs. 🚀 to extract key requirements including Skills (technical and soft), Experience levels (years, roles), Qualifications (essential vs. preferred), and Industry-specific keywords. Infer company culture and role expectations where possible.
tasks_output.name: analyze_job_posting
tasks_output.expected_output: A structured JSON breakdown, e.g., {"skills": {"technical": ["Python", "SQL"], "soft": ["Communication"]}, "experience": {"years": "3-5", "roles": "Developer"}, "qualifications": {"essential": ["BS CS"], "preferred": ["AWS"]}, "keywords": ["Agile", "Cloud"], "culture": "Collaborative"}

tasks_output.description: Compare the extracted resume details with job requirements from { job_posting } using text analysis. Evaluate alignment by matching skills, experience, and qualifications. Identify gaps, calculate a match score (0-100%), and suggest improvements to enhance job fit.
tasks_output.name: compare_resume_with_job
tasks_output.expected_output: A JSON comparison report, e.g., {"match_score": 85, "skills_match": {"present": ["Python"], "missing": ["SQL"]}, "experience_match": "4 years vs. 3-5 required", "gaps": ["Needs SQL"], "suggestions": ["Add SQL projects"], "strengths": ["Python expertise"]}
tasks_output.summary: Compare the extracted resume details with job requirements from {...
tasks_output.raw:
```json
{
  "match_score": 75,
  "skills_match": {
    "present": [
      "Python",
      "TensorFlow",
      "PyTorch",
      "Scikit-learn",
      "SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL)",
      "Docker",
      "NLP (LangChain, LLM Fine-tuning)",
      "Computer Vision (OpenCV, Keras)"

      "AWS",
      "Azure",
      "Google Cloud",
      "Kubernetes",
      "APIs",
      "MLOps",
      "CI/CD"
    ]

  "gaps": [
    "Needs experience with NoSQL databases",
    "Lacks experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)",
    "Needs experience with Kubernetes, APIs, MLOps, and CI/CD",
    "No contributions to open-source AI projects"
  ],
  "suggestions": [
    "Add experience or projects related to NoSQL databases",
    "Gain experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)",
    "Include projects or experience with Kubernetes, APIs, MLOps, and CI/CD",
    "Consider contributing to open-source AI projects"
  ],
  "strengths": [
    "Strong experience with Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn",
    "Relevant certifications and projects in AI and machine learning",
    "Experience with Docker and SQL databases",
    "Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently"
  ]
}
```

experience.description: Independently developed and fine-tuned GPT-3.5-turbo-1106 models for enhanced conversational AI for CarChat24 – AI-Driven Automotive Chatbot. Managed and formatted proprietary chat data into JSONL format, improving AI model training and response accuracy. Integrated AI-driven backend features using C#, .NET, SQL, and Docker, including automated billing and invoicing. Developed backend systems with C#, PostgreSQL, and Docker for WEBEL – Government Project, implementing features like multi-payment processing, onboarding, and offboarding. Conducted regular client meetings, resolved complex system bugs, and ensured a seamless user experience. Designed and implemented an AI-based speech-to-text system for SyncExpress – AI Video Transcription (US Law Firm), reducing 2-3 hour video transcription time to 15-20 minutes without GPU acceleration. Optimized text comparison algorithms for increased transcription accuracy and automated legal documentation workflows.
Designed an AI-based ATM automation workflow, implementing modern software development practices for enhanced efficiency.

experience.company: Codeclouds, Remote – Sector V, Kolkata, West Bengal
experience.description: Developed AI-integrated backend solutions for an e-commerce platform using PHP, React JS, and SQL, enhancing user engagement through intelligent automation.

Analyzed large datasets to provide insights and recommendations to stakeholders. Developed and maintained data pipelines using Python and SQL. Created visualizations and dashboards using Tableau. Conducted A/B testing to measure the impact of changes.
